creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: brown cloth; cap with short twisted tassels/ties on each side; twisted fringe on back at crown; fringe and body decorated with small pieces of aluminum in lines and crosses on body of cap
dimension: 5 5/16 x 7 1/2 x 7 1/4 in. (13.49 x 19.05 x 18.42 cm) (without ties or fringe)
title: Hat
